OOC: Klant fired at BrightBlade, too.

BIC: Klant flings a disk at the shot, the disk explodes into flames. Klant
gasps. What kind of unworldly powers did this bot have? He flung a disk at
BrightBlade, if it it, it would inject a poison that attacked the offline
circuitry, putting the bot into comotose. (Can't spell that word, but it
means putting someone to sleep)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 8:39 PM
Subject: Here!


( BB: Kinda finny just how people turn on someone just because they don't
post quick enough! There, Code. Happy? I posted.)


: BrightBlade yelled as some sort of powder fell onto her, shaking her
entire body and trying to get it off. She almost wished the sprinklers were
on, to wash this crap off. Because now, more then ever, she could be seen.
She grumbled, well, there was no need to be cloaked now.
BrightBlade growled as she deactivated her cloaking device, raising her gun
towards Klant and firing a round.
Her gun was set for the charges to explode on impact, shots that could prove
to be fatal.:
